org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.controls

Class ContentObjectToolbarButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.controls.ContentObjectToolbarButton

  • public class ContentObjectToolbarButton
extends java.lang.Object
    Icon widget that is part of the toolbar of a selected content object in the page view.
    Author:
    clc

        tooltip - Tooltip text

      • ContentObjectToolbarButton

        public ContentObjectToolbarButton(java.lang.String imageUrl,
                          java.lang.String tooltip,
                          boolean toggleButton)
        Constructor with selection for push or toggle button.
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - Icon resource
        tooltip - Tooltip text
        toggleButton - If true a toggle button is created, otherwise a push button.

    • Method Detail

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enable)

      • setDown

        public void setDown(boolean down)
        Sets the state of the toggle button.
        If the control is a push button, this method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        down - Use true for active/down and false for inactive/up

      • isDown

        public boolean isDown()
        Returns the state of the toggle button.
        If the control is a push button, false is returned. return true for active/down or false for inactive/up
